Description:
We are currently seeking a highly motivated and skilled Junior Mechanical Engineer to join our team in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. As a Junior Mechanical Engineer, you will be responsible for assisting in the design, development, and implementation of mechanical systems, equipment, and processes. You will work closely with senior engineers and project managers to ensure the successful completion of projects within budget and on schedule. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background in mechanical engineering, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to work effectively in a team environment.Responsibilities:Assist in the design and development of mechanical systems and equipment.
Conduct research to determine the feasibility, design, and cost of new mechanical systems.
Prepare and present technical reports, proposals, and project plans.
Perform calculations and analysis to ensure the proper functioning and safety of mechanical systems.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful implementation of mechanical systems.
Conduct tests and experiments to evaluate the performance of mechanical systems.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues with mechanical systems, equipment, and processes.
Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.
Maintain accurate documentation of design specifications, processes, and test results.
Stay current with advancements in mechanical engineering technology and techniques.Skills
